about_the_game:
Team up with your friends in this top down dungeon crawler! Use teamwork to navigate through procedurally generated dungeons, slay bosses and collect their precious crystals. Keep your guard up and remember that these dungeons also have other players competing with you! Find different guns and items that help you and your team to seize the victory.



Explore procedurally generated dungeons with unique layouts every playthrough. Master the dungeon's layout before your enemies get the grip of the battle.




Defeat the bosses with or without your friends and get all the loot safely back to your team's base. Find treasures, guns and gold which can be used in shops.




Your base is eventually going to attract opposing teammates who will target it in hopes of stealing your hard earned treasures. Drive those thieves away with your guns blazing. While at it, try to fight your way to your opponents' base and take away everything they've managed to collect.



  • Procedurally generated dungeons
  • Up to 6 player multiplayer
  • Cool guns
  • Lots of enemies that guard the dungeon and it's treasures

Team up with your friends in this top down dungeon crawler! Use teamwork to navigate through procedurally generated dungeons, slay bosses and collect their precious crystals. Keep your guard up and remember that these dungeons also have other players competing with you! Find different guns and items that help you and your team to seize the victory.



Explore procedurally generated dungeons with unique layouts every playthrough. Master the dungeon's layout before your enemies get the grip of the battle.




Defeat the bosses with or without your friends and get all the loot safely back to your team's base. Find treasures, guns and gold which can be used in shops.




Your base is eventually going to attract opposing teammates who will target it in hopes of stealing your hard earned treasures. Drive those thieves away with your guns blazing. While at it, try to fight your way to your opponents' base and take away everything they've managed to collect.

name: Conquer the Dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Dual core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel hd 520
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Conquer the dungeon is a multiplayer roguelike inspired by Enter the Gungeon. Clear the dungeon, obtain cool guns and play against another team. Collect the power crystals from boss fights, carry them to your team's base and try to steal the opposing team's crystals!
supported_languages: English, Finnish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Russian
